title: Digital Maturity Quadrant Model
description: Interactive exploration of the four digital maturity archetypes with organizational placement exercise
creator: Claude Code
subject: Digital Transformation
Maturity Model
Strategic Planning
learningObjectives: Classify organizations into digital maturity quadrants
Recommend improvement vectors for each archetype

controls.name: Organization Placement
controls.description: Drag organizations to position on quadrant

controls.name: Add Organization
controls.description: Add a new organization to assess

assumptions: Two dimensions capture key aspects of digital maturity
Organizations can be meaningfully positioned on continuous scales
Recommendations are general guidelines, not prescriptive
